description: Online profile configuration for a business. Contains settings for client-facing features like supported languages and privacy policy used by the Client Portal. This is a singleton resource - each business has at most one online profile.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the online profile record.

business_uid.description: Unique identifier of the business that owns this online profile.

supported_languages.description: List of ISO 639-1 language/locale codes supported by the business for client-facing content (e.g., ["en", "es", "en-GB"]).

privacy_policy_url.description: External URL to the business's privacy policy page (e.g., "https://example.com/privacy"). Null if not configured.

created_at.description: The date and time when the online profile was created, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the online profile was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
